metadata.title: CVE-2013-1576 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - low
metadata.description:
The dissect_sdp_media_attribute function in epan/dissectors/packet-sdp.c inthe SDP dissector in Wireshark 1.6.x before 1.6.13 and 1.8.x before 1.8.5does not properly process crypto-suite parameters, which allows remoteattackers to cause a denial of service (infinite loop) via a malformedpacket.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2013-1576` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libwireshark-data - 1.10.6-1
libwireshark3 - 1.10.6-1
libwiretap3 - 1.10.6-1
libwsutil3 - 1.10.6-1
tshark - 1.10.6-1
wireshark - 1.10.6-1
wireshark-common - 1.10.6-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: wireshark package in trusty, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.10.6-1').
